text: Barnabás Steinmetz (born 6 October 1975 in Budapest) is a Hungarian water polo player who played on the gold medal squads at the 2000 Summer Olympics and 2004 Summer Olympics. He is nicknamed Barney and Sema, and made his debut for the national team in 1993, at an international tournament in Moscow, Russia. He is currently the player of Vasas SC. ==Honours== ===National=== * Olympic Games: 15px Gold medal - 2000, 2004 * World Championships: 15px Gold medal - 2003; 15px Silver medal - 1998 * European Championship: 15px Gold medal - 1997, 1999;
